thread.title: Kaye Petersen
thread.title_full: California Casualty Auto and Home Insurance reviewed by Kaye Petersen

author: Kaye Petersen
title: Kaye Petersen
text: We had a problem with the roof leaking. This caused severe black mold damage. They replaced our ceiling and reinsullated. We were in contact with claims agent. Contractor wanted more for travel. They held them to their bid. They tried to get money from us. Insurance company backed us up. Great coverage.
